text: Kroken is a part of Tromsø, a city in Norway. It's on the mainland, across from the city centre which is on an island called Tromsøya. It's near Tromsdalen and Movik. Kroken is mostly houses and has two schools, a church, a football club, and a big shopping mall with Norway's biggest Coop Prix store. It's estimated altitude is above sea level. == References == Category:Tromsø
title: Kroken, Troms
